title: Data show COVID vaccines are a “spectacular failure”
cleaned_text:
Data from multiple countries showed that there is a correlation between Wuhan coronavirus (COVID-19) vaccination rates and worsening infections rates in the past year. British data showed that the shots are an “abysmal failure” as COVID infection rates continue to soar among the vaccinated in the United Kingdom.

Among the latest data showed official statistics from the U.K. government that said COVID infection rates are higher among “fully vaccinated” adults. Infection growth rates are also rising faster in the fully vaccinated than in the unvaccinated, proving that vaccine passports and mandates are completely pointless and nothing more than coercion tools.

Regardless of the number of shots that a person has received, infections and transmissions continue. Further, the vaccinated are now known to be incubators for mutating strains, showing how detrimental vaccination has become to public health. (Related: At least half of new coronavirus infections now happening in vaccinated people as “vaccine failure” phenomenon worsens.)

Using the government data, a Twitter user created a series of graphs that showed across the board how the fully vaccinated have significantly higher rates of COVID infections. On a separate graph, the user shared how infection rates are rising faster in fully vaccinated individuals than in the unvaccinated, which is not a result of higher vaccination rates.

The user also determined the growth of infection rates for each age by comparing data in the surveillance report. It showed that while the infection rate among the unvaccinated remains flat across age groups, the infection growth rate among the fully vaccinated is trending upward.

The graphs presented by the user clearly invalidate any need for vaccine mandates. Data from Scotland show more of the same information, as well.

According to reports, fully vaccinated Scots are more likely to be hospitalized for COVID compared to unvaccinated individuals. This comes amid data showing that case rates have been lower in the unvaccinated compared to fully vaccinated ones, even compared to those who already got their booster shots since the omicron variant became dominant in Scotland.

COVID hospitalization data from mainstream media remain unreliable because those who tested positive for COVID counted as hospitalization cases whether or not they are symptomatic.

On an international scale, journalists are also starting to switch narratives away from the increasing cases, hospitalizations and deaths by focusing on how “unreliable” the released data are. (Related: Reality vs gaslighting: The vaccine failure stares us straight in the eyes.)

For two years, dissenting opinions about treatment and vaccines have been labeled as dangerous misinformation, even when they are completely accurate, showing that propaganda is working: however, as press members backtrack to save their credibility does not change the fact that they acted as promoters of propaganda.

Mainstream media is now admitting that COVID death rates have also been overcounted from the start because of the reliance on faulty PCR testing, which is now proven to be unreliable in diagnosing active infections, with its excessive cycle thresholds generating ridiculous numbers of false positives.

News outlets are also now moving away from unreliable data like case counts, hospitalizations and deaths, in an attempt to change the narrative without losing credibility.

However, the problem is that the narrative that mainstream media wants people to believe does not paint a true picture of the impact of COVID either, due to the lack of patients and massive numbers of staff who were fired for not getting vaccinated.

At least half of new coronavirus infections now happening in vaccinated people as “vaccine failure” phenomenon worsens.

CDC panicking over covid vaccine failure, pushes third “booster” shot even as public grows wise to the scam.

Merck gives up trying to make coronavirus vaccine after total failure.

DESIGNED TO FAIL: Israeli scientists document rapid FAILURE of covid vaccines, push booster shots anyway.

Watch the video below to learn more about how vaccines are a complete failure in controlling the pandemic.

This video is from The New American channel on Brighteon.com.

Follow Pandemic.news for more updates about the coronavirus pandemic.
